name: Poisonous Snake
description: A small, stealthy predator with a venomous bite, found in forests, jungles, or deserts. It can blend into its environment, making it hard to spot until it strikes.
memorable: Its venomous bite can paralyze or kill smaller creatures, posing a significant threat despite its size.
goals: Focus on survival and hunting smaller prey.
relations: Often found in areas with abundant small prey, may encounter other predatory beasts.
strengths: High dexterity allows it to be stealthy and avoid detection; venomous bite is effective against smaller creatures.
weaknesses: Very low hit points and weak physical attributes make it fragile in direct combat.
attacks: Bite attack that delivers piercing damage along with additional poison damage on failure to save.
most_powerful_ability: Injecting venom on a bite that can inflict significant poison damage to unprepared targets.
senses: The snake has blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to sense nearby creatures without sight.
additional_information: Can swim and move effectively in various terrains.
Camouflages well in its environment, making it hard to spot.
Uses stealth to surprise its prey.
test_queries: small predatory snake found in jungle
stealthy snake that poisons smaller prey
snake with blindsight and poison attack
fragile but dangerous snake in forests
